title: European stocks tumble further as Brexit, trade worries deepen
text:
European stocks tumble further as Brexit, trade worries deepen

Stock Markets 52 minutes ago (Oct 08, 2019 12:21)

© Reuters. European stocks tumble further as Brexit, trade worries deepen LONDON (Reuters) - European stocks tumbled further on Tuesday afternoon as worries about fresh uncertainty over Britain's exit from the European Union and trade talks between China and the United States later this week deepened. The pan European STOXX 600 ( ) was down 1% at 1112 GMT, extending earlier losses.

European stocks tumble further as Brexit, trade worries deepen
description: European stocks tumble further as Brexit, trade worries deepen
